snippet: The bureau compiled a dossier in 1991, when Mr. Jobs was president of NeXT, because he was being considered for an appointment to President George H.W. Bush's Export Council. The document contains a few salacious details that come as little surprise...
abstract: The bureau compiled a dossier in 1991, when Mr. Jobs was president of NeXT, because he was being considered for an appointment to President George H.W. Bush's Export Council. The document contains a few salacious details that come as little surprise two decades later.

headline.main: What Was in the F.B.I.'s Steve Jobs File
